text: The day so many in the WWE Universe hoped they would see is actually upon us : Daniel Bryan is an active Superstar once more. The fan favorite and current “ SmackDown Live ” general manager has been medically cleared by WWE to wrestle again — and just in time for WrestleMania 34. Bryan does not yet have an opponent for next month ’ s WrestleMania 34, but you better believe Vince McMahon & co. are scrambling to make that happen. The undersized Bryan ’ s in - ring career was shut down two years ago following a series of concussions. Now, he ’ s got the thumbs - up from numerous neurologists, WWE says.
